title: Understanding the Therapeutic Environment
text: The therapeutic environment is more than just a physical space. It encompasses the supportive conditions that promote healing and well-being.

title: Components of a Therapeutic Environment
text: Consider both the physical location and the emotional and psychological support provided in that setting.
